title: The best of the Olympic Channel Podcast 2018
description:
To celebrate our first incredible year, we have put together highlights from some of our most downloaded interviews of the year.

We have an absolute stellar line-up including Simone Biles, John Orozco, Anthony Ervin, Brian Orser and Yuzuru Hanyu.

LINKS:

Simone Biles

John Orozco

John’s song

Anthony Ervin

Brian Orser

Yuzuru Hanyu
